title: Williams: the big comeback
summary: In August 2020 Dorilton Capital purchased Williams from the Williams family for a reported £152m. Its mission statement was to return Williams to the top, investing however much time and…

qa_pairs.question: Which investment firm purchased the Williams F1 team in 2020?

What was the reported purchase price for the Williams F1 team when it was sold?
